QuestData.Title: Our Mortal Enemies
QuestData.Description: Hey, new $g guy: girl;, take a look at this.$b$b<The dwarf flips up his eyepatch to reveal a living, functional eyeball.>$b$bI don't wear this patch because of any lost eye. I wear it because this OTHER eye is so strong, the normal one was just weighin' it down.$b$bThis eye's good for seein' all kinds of things, like those masked hooligans that follow us around. Fleet Master says that they've been spotted over on Jaguero Isle. Once you get there, fire this flare gun, and I'll help you spot 'em.
QuestData.CompletionText: They're our mortal enemies, $n. We have no choice but to fight them.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. The eternal battle wages on, but we've tipped the scales in favor of the pirates today. Firallon will be happy to hear the news.
